verses.name: Ezra 10:15
verses.text: Only Jonathan the son of Asahel and Jahaziah the son of Tikvah were employed about this matter: and Meshullam and Shabbethai the Levite helped them.

verses.name: Ezra 10:16
verses.text: And the children of the captivity did so. And Ezra the priest, with certain chief of the fathers, after the house of their fathers, and all of them by their names, were separated, and sat down in the first day of the tenth month to examine the matter.

verses.name: Ezra 10:17
verses.text: And they made an end with all the men that had taken strange wives by the first day of the first month.
